trans-unit.source: Animates from the <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> value of the previous key frame to its own <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value*> using splined interpolation.
trans-unit.target: 从进行动画处理<xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref>到其自身上一个关键帧的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value*>使用样条内插。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This class is used as part of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection> in conjunction with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to animate a <xref:System.Windows.Point> property value along a set of key frames.
trans-unit.target: 此类用作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection>结合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>要进行动画处理<xref:System.Windows.Point>根据一组关键帧的属性值。</xref:System.Windows.Point> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrameCollection>

trans-unit.source: A key frame defines a segment of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames> to which it belongs.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧定义的一个段<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>它所属。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointAnimationUsingKeyFrames>

trans-unit.source: Each key frame has a target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 每个关键帧具有目标<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A> specifies the time at which the key frame's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A> should be reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>指定的时间关键帧的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A>应到达。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PointKeyFrame.KeyTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: A key frame animates from the target value of the previous key frame to its own target value.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧动画应用到其自己的目标值的上一个关键帧的目标值。

trans-unit.source: It starts when the previous key frame ends and ends when its own key time is reached.
trans-unit.target: 它将启动时上一个关键帧结束，并在达到其自己的关键时间时结束。

trans-unit.source: Spline key frames like SplinePointKeyFrame create a variable transition between values, which is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame.KeySpline%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如 SplinePointKeyFrame 样条关键帧创建变量值，由之间转换<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame.KeySpline%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame.KeySpline%2A>

trans-unit.source: Splined interpolation can be used to achieve more realistic "real world" timing effects such as acceleration and deceleration.
trans-unit.target: 样条内插可用来实现更现实可行等加速和减速的"实际"计时效果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"></xref>使用指定的结束值的类。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 结束关键帧的值 （也称为"目标值"）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value and key time.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"></xref>类指定的结束值和关键时间。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 结束关键帧的值 （也称为"目标值"）。

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的关键时间。

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached, which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: 关键时间确定何时达到目标值，这也是关键帧的结束时。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"></xref> class with the specified ending value, key time, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"></xref>类，该类具有指定的结束值、 关键时间和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Ending value (also known as "target value") for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 结束关键帧的值 （也称为"目标值"）。

trans-unit.source: Key time for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 关键帧的关键时间。

trans-unit.source: The key time determines when the target value is reached, which is also when the key frame ends.
trans-unit.target: 关键时间确定何时达到目标值，这也是关键帧的结束时。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> for the key frame.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref>关键帧。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"></xref> represents a Bezier curve that defines animation progress of the key frame.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.KeySpline"> </xref>表示定义关键帧的动画进度的贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The new instance.
trans-unit.target: 新实例。

trans-unit.source: Uses splined interpolation to transition between the previous key frame value and the value of the current key frame.
trans-unit.target: 使用样条内的插在上一个关键帧值和当前关键帧值之间进行切换。

trans-unit.source: The value to animate from.
trans-unit.target: 动画起始值。

trans-unit.source: A value from 0.0 through 1.0 that specifies the percentage of time that has elapsed for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 从 0.0 到 1.0，指定此关键帧已经过去的时间百分比值。

trans-unit.source: The output value of this key frame given the specified base value and progress.
trans-unit.target: 此关键帧的输出值给定了指定的基值和进度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the two control points that define animation progress for this key frame.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置两个控制点，它们定义此关键帧的动画进度。

trans-unit.source: To understand how a KeySpline works, it is helpful to understand cubic Bezier curves.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解 KeySpline 的工作原理，最好先了解三次方贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: A cubic Bezier curve is defined by a start point, an end point, and two control points.
trans-unit.target: 由一个起点、 终点和两个控制点定义三次方贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: The two coordinates in the KeySpline define those two control points.
trans-unit.target: KeySpline 中的两个坐标定义这两个控制点。

trans-unit.source: When describing key splines, the start point of the Bezier curve is always 0, and the end point is always 1, which is why you define only the two control points.
trans-unit.target: 贝塞尔曲线的起始点时描述关键样条，始终是 0 和终结点始终为 1，这正是你只定义两个控制点。

trans-unit.source: The resulting curve specifies how an animation is interpolated during a time segment; that is, the curve represents the rate of change in the animation's target attribute over the time segment.
trans-unit.target: 所得到的曲线指定的时间段; 期间内插动画的方式也就是说，曲线到的时间段表示的动画的目标属性中的变动率。

trans-unit.source: To better see the relationship between animation progress and a Bezier curve, see [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011).
trans-unit.target: 若要更好地了解动画进度和贝塞尔曲线之间的关系，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The two control points that specify the cubic Bezier curve that defines the progress of the key frame.
trans-unit.target: 这两个控制点，它们指定定义关键帧进度的三次贝塞尔曲线。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame.KeySpline*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame.KeySpline*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.SplinePointKeyFrame.KeySpline*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
